LEVEL 22:STAGE TO CAPTURE GOLEM
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: LEVEL 22:STAGE TO CAPTURE GOLEM
By Y.K.TAN on Tuesday, May 14, 2002 - 11:33 pm:

LEVEL 22

At the start of the stage,wait for the green colour,turn to pumpkin monster,facing right,when the green monster comes,destroy the box and he'll fall(still alive,not die yet.) Create a box in the place of the box you destroyed,and climb up the ledge. Move all the way to the right,and jump down the ledge,where a second green monster is there. On that ledge,once that second green monster sees you,he'll turn into a pumpkin. The ledge below you is a dino and the first green monster time your aiming right and hit the second pumpkin(green monster transformed into pumpkin.) And the pumpkin will squashed the dino to death. Jumping down the ledge,beware of suddenly the third pumpkin dude comes.

Complete Level 23 guide: After that,just destroy the pumpkin monsters and get the key.

Get golem: You have to pumpkin's now. the dino below is the trouble,time your aiming right,and once the dino is nearly going to reach ,hit the pumpkin and squash the dino. At the left most ledge,you can see that there is a gap there,create a box in that gap,and destroy it,now with the dino gone,jump down the gap,getting the red feather for the bonus stage,and the irritating dino gone,make your way up to the bonus stage.

!!HELP!! I CAN'T HIT THE DINO'S
You know where the pumpkin will roll to or roll down the ledge,before the Dino is about to walk into your "Death trap" where you know the plan of it. It takes time for the pumpkin to fall,and time wasted if the dino has move off a second earlier before the pumpkin crashed on it.
